document.title: Technical Bulletins: Disaster Control for Local Government Correctional Facilities
document.abstract: The very nature of a correctional facility makes it particularly vulnerable to disaster because of restrictions places on prisoners for their own safety. So that their welfare and that of any visitors is better protected, a written disaster plan should be formulated. Following is a list of specific elements of such a plan and a discussion of its implementation.
